mean_cn: n.茎，梗；  v.隐伏跟踪，（为搜索而）走遍
mean_en: to illegally follow and watch somebody over a long period of time, in a way that is annoying or frightening; to move slowly and quietly towards an animal or a person, in order to kill, catch or harm it or them
sentence: The stalks of these grasses are over half a meter high.
sentence_trans: 这些草茎有超过半米高。
